ultigpx
Class ElevationView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ultigpx.MapView
                      ultigpx.BasicMapView
                          ultigpx.ElevationView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
 class ElevationView
extends BasicMapView

I know this is HIDEOUSLY UGLY but I just wanted to see if technically it would work to sync up the elevation view and the other map views in a straightforward way. I pretty much re-implemented random functions from the Map-View and BasicMapView as necessary, to allow for this "side view." Which amounts to basically re-wiring "elevation" into everywhere there is a reference to "latitude."

Author:
Nathan
